speech_score.transcript: Hi. I will speak very slowly here and I'll speak very fast here. And can you tell the stress here?

score_issue_list.detail_message: The response is less than 20 words.

length.message: Your response is too short to demonstrate the necessary grammatical range. You should aim for a minimum of 5 sentences or 60 words.

lexical_diversity.message: Your response lacks variation in syntactic structures. You should use diverse verbs and adjective/adverbial modifiers.

grammatical_range.message: Your response lacks grammatical range. You should demonstrate variation in phrasal and clausal structures and verb-argument constructions.

noun_phrase_complexity.message: Your response lacks noun phrase complexity. You should use richer modifiers in noun phrases by using adjectives, relative clauses, prepositional phrases, non-finite elements, determiners, and demonstratives.

noun_phrase_variation.message: Your response lacks noun phrase variation. You should vary the structure of noun phrases particularly in terms of the numbers and types of modifiers used.

verb_construction_variation.message: Your response lacks verb construction variation. In addition to verbs with simple fixed structures, you should use verbs that may require different numbers and types of structural elements.

lexical_diversity.message: Your response is low on word diversity. You should aim to reduce repetition and use more diverse words.

word_sophistication.message: Your response uses more common words than most advanced speakers. To improve, you should aim to learn and use more advanced and less common vocabulary.

word_specificity.message: Your response uses more general words than most advanced speakers. To improve, you should aim to learn and use verbs, nouns, and adjectives more specific to the meaning you wish to convey.

idiomaticity.message: Your use of word combinations is unusual and typical of adaptation from another language. You should study and use combinations such as adjective-noun and adverb-verb which are associated with each other and found in idiomatic language.

basic_connectives.message: Your response overuses basic connectives. See the list of most overused basic connectives and practice replacing some instances of these with more advanced connectives where appropriate.

negative_connectives.message: Your response is low or lacking in use of negative connectives. You should practice negative connectives such as admittedly, alternatively, nevertheless, conversely to signal contrast where appropriate.

pronoun_density.message: Your response is low on pronouns. You should practice replacing some repeated nouns with third person pronouns where appropriate.

adverb_diversity.message: Your response is low on adverb diversity. See the list of most overused adverbs and practice avoiding repeating adverbs especially in consecutive sentences.
